issue.title: Block graph.facebook.com connection that a bank do.
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

last version

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed analytics or tracker

### Which browser(s) do you use?

the problem is with app, not a site

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

||graph.facebook.com^$app=cl.android

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, AdGuard Spanish/Portuguese filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. Hello. The app "Banco Falabella", a popular bank that is in Colombia, Chile, etc, connects to "graph.facebook.com", even that the app doesn't have any functionality and connection to Facebook. 

2. Screenshots

![Screenshot_2023-01-20-21-22-10-732-edit_com adguard android](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/79816807/213828554-91b67dc4-3e5d-4bf3-9184-52120f70682d.jpg)

||graph.facebook.com^$app=cl.android

Thanks!

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
I don't have a clue why it is inconsistent. I shut down my computer over night. After booting up in the morning AdGuard worked just fine. I can't explain it, and am thankful it's working now.

------- Original Message -------
On Friday, January 20th, 2023 at 2:33 AM, Alex ***@***.***> wrote:

> ***@***.***(https://github.com/ihave1000usernames) Please open the filtering log, reproduce an issue and make a screenshot(s) of the log.
>
> —
> Reply to this email directly, [view it on GitHub](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/140532#issuecomment-1398196469), or [unsubscribe](https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/A5LMFPCC5VY2AJQ4CASYQWLWTJSW3ANCNFSM6AAAAAAUAMFOPQ).
> You are receiving this because you were mentioned.Message ID: ***@***.***>
